meanings.definition: A printed publication containing news, articles, and advertisements.
meanings.sent1: I read the newspapers every morning to catch up on current events.
meanings.sent2: My dad works for the local newspapers as a journalist.
meanings.sent3: The cat used the newspapers as a cozy bed, making a mess of the living room.
meanings.sent4: The newspapers of the town were like a window into the community's daily life.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh newspapers always reminds me of my grandfather's study.

meanings.definition: The organization responsible for producing and distributing news through printed publications.
meanings.sent1: The newspapers in our city have been reporting on the upcoming election.
meanings.sent2: I hope to work for a reputable newspapers one day as a reporter.
meanings.sent3: The newspapers were in a frenzy trying to cover the breaking news of the celebrity scandal.
meanings.sent4: The newspapers acted as the voice of the people during times of political unrest.
meanings.sent5: The newspapers played a crucial role in shaping public opinion on the issue.
